query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS marketingLeads (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(320) NOT NULL,
  company VARCHAR(255),
  role VARCHAR(255),
  phone VARCHAR(50),
  numSDRs VARCHAR(50),
  timeline VARCHAR(100),
  challenges TEXT,
  source ENUM('whitepaper', 'calculator', 'demo-request', 'linkedin', 'seo', 'referral') NOT NULL,
  leadScore INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  stage ENUM('awareness', 'consideration', 'decision', 'qualified', 'disqualified') DEFAULT 'awareness' NOT NULL,
  status ENUM('new', 'contacted', 'nurturing', 'qualified', 'converted', 'lost') DEFAULT 'new' NOT NULL,
  assignedAgentId INT,
  lastContactedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  qualifiedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  convertedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  metadata JSON,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)

  status ENUM('new', 'contacted', 'nurturing', 'qualified', 'converted', 'lost') DEFAULT 'new' NOT NULL,
  assignedAgentId INT,
  lastContactedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  qualifiedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  convertedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  metadata JSON,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
